resources.string:
Two-factor authentication (2FA): This adds an
 extra layer of security by requiring a second
 factor, such as a code sent to your phone, in
 addition to your password to log in.

Password strength requirements: This ensures
your password is difficult to guess by
enforcing minimum length and complexity
rules.

Data encryption: This protects your sensitive
information, such as account numbers and
social security numbers, from being accessed
by unauthorized users.
Secure session management: This ensures\nyour session is automatically terminated after a\nperiod of inactivity or if you log out.
